AI Description: Pixy is a runtime program analysis tool that detects vulnerabilities in software applications written in C or C++. It uses static analysis techniques to scan the source code and identify potential security issues.
Core Features: Static Analysis Of C/C++ Source Code, Detection Of Security Vulnerabilities, Identification Of Potentially Unsafe Code Patterns, Integration With Build Systems For Continuous Analysis
General Tags: Static Analysis, Security, C/C++, Runtime Analysis
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Computer Science, Software Engineering, Systems, & Development
